General.Name: Quantum Numbers Inc
General.Description: Quantum eMotion Corp. engages in the development of cryptographic solutions based on quantum random number generators in Canada. It develops and markets encrypted data and communication solutions for financial, military, mobile, and internet telecommunication sectors. The company was formerly known as Quantum Numbers Corp. and changed its name to Quantum eMotion Inc. in June 2021. Quantum eMotion Corp. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 2300 Alfred Nobel Boulevard, Montreal, QC, Canada, H4S 2A4
